text: "Forgive Me Friend" is a song recorded by Swedish group Smith & Thell and Swedish Jam Factory, and released as a single in October 2018. ==Charts== ===Weekly charts=== {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text- align:center" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (2018–2019) ! scope="col"| Peak position |- |- |- |} ===Year-end charts=== {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (2019) ! scope="col"| Position |- ! scope="row"| Poland (ZPAV) | 8 |- ! scope="row"| Sweden (Sverigetopplistan) | 39 |- ! scope="row"| US Hot Rock Songs (Billboard) | 78 |} ==Certifications== ==See also== * List of number-one singles of 2019 (Poland) ==References== Category:2018 singles Category:2018 songs Category:Number-one singles in Poland
title: Forgive Me Friend
